賦.definition: poetic essay; taxation; to bestow on; to endow with

賦予.definition: to assign; to entrust (a task); to give; to bestow

賦能.definition: (neologism c. 2019) to empower; to enable; to energize

賦與.definition: variant of 賦予|赋予[fu4 yu3]

賦閒.definition: to stay idle at home; to have resigned from office; to be unemployed; to have been fired; to be on a sabbatical
